# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String; text_width::Int=10)
    lines = []
    for word in split(text, " ")
        if length(word) > text_width
            error("Word '$word' is longer than the maximum width $text_width.")
        end
        if length(join(lines, "")) + length(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, "")
        end
        push!(lines, word)
    end
    return join(lines, "\n")
end
```

# Example

```julia
julia> wrap_string("Hello there. This is a very long sentence that will test the wrapping functionality."; text_width=20)
"Hello there.\nThis is a very long\nsentence that will test\nthe wrapping functionality."
```
